channel.title: Cooper Hoffman on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cooper Hoffman on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Long Walk’ Marches Into Comic-Con With New Trailer, Harrowing Footage
item.description: “We kept the teeth,” said screenwriter JT Mollner of the thriller that adapts the truly dystopian Stephen King novel.
